body.p:
Louisa March 29/62
Dear Governor
Dear sir

I send you petition of Mrs Meed, for remission of a fine her case is a fitting one for executive interfearance I confidently petition you to remit. If you refuse I demand that you should cease to make any pretensons to gallantry.

Louisa Ky March 18 1862
To the Hon
B Magoffin

Your Petitioners would represent that they are acquanted with Sarah Meed who has lately been fined before Robert spencer J, P, L C the sum of $27,79 cnts for a breach of the Peace We recommend to you to remit the fine as the case presents many mitigating circumstances and the defendant Meed is a poor woman

Signed by
